message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Alice, I appreciate the offer but $12,000 is a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $11,000.
Alice, $11,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm firm on my previous offer of $9,000.  It's the most I can afford. If you're not willing to go lower, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you're really looking to make a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money on the deal. I can offer it to you for $10,500.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm going to stick with my offer of $9,000.  If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm going to have to go with another option.
